@comment: English translation (also used as default translation)

confirmStopGnikrap.title: Stop Gnikrap
confirmStopGnikrap.message: Do you want to stop Gnikrap (and return to the 'brick menu') or to stop the brick?

workArea.@comment: The list of the work area available

saveScriptModal.title: Save the script with the following name:

clearScriptModal.title: Are you sure to clear the current script ?

fixGenikrapErrorModal.title: Please fix errors (see on the notification part for more details)

configureKeyboardButtonModal.title: Enter the name(s) of the button (use the comma to separate several names)

resetKeyboardModal.title: Are you sure to clear the current xTouch configuration ?

saveKeyboardModal.title: Save the keyboard with the following name:

gyroSensorTab.xAxis: x is the front-back tilt in degrees where front is positive (also known as 'beta' with 'Portrait' orientation)
gyroSensorTab.yAxis: y is the left-right tilt in degrees, where right is positive (also known as 'gamma' with 'Portrait' orientation)
gyroSensorTab.zAxis: z is the compass direction of the device in degrees (also known as 'alpha')
gyroSensorTab.zAxisNote: Note: Some devices don't support compass (the z value will always be 0). For some devices, the compass don't returns the angle with the north.

setAxisDialogFull.title: Set device orientation
setAxisDialogFull.message: Select the orientation of your device in order to have expected values. The default orientation is 'Portrait', in general it's when the power cord is at the bottom of your device.

videoSensorTab.addPoints: Click on the video to add objects to track
videoSensorTab.pointsNoMoreTracked: The object '__name__' has been lost, it will no more be tracked

errors.maximumTrackedPointsReached: The maximum number of object to track (__number__) has been reached
errors.videoAccessRefused: Error while accessing to the webcam

configureTrackedPointNameModal.title: Enter the name of the object to track

geoSensorTab.latitude: Latitude is the north-south position of a point on the Earth's surface (0째 for equator, +90째 for north pole, -90째 for south pole).
geoSensorTab.longitude: Longitude is the east-west position of a point on the Earth's surface (0째 for Greenwich meridian).
geoSensorTab.accuracy: The accuracy (in meter) of the latitude and longitude.
geoSensorTab.altitude: The altitude (in metter) from the see level (Some devices don't support altitude, the value will always be 0).
geoSensorTab.altitudeAccuracy: The accuracy (in meter) of the altitude (Some devices don't support altitude, the value will always be 0).
geoSensorTab.timestamp: The timestamp (date and time) where the geolocation has been done.

errors.permissionDenied: You should accept geolocation in order to have the xGeo sensor working (__detail__)
errors.positionUnavailable: There is an internal problem during the geolocation (__detail__)

manageFilesModal.title: Manage files
manageFilesModal.confirmFileDeletion: Confirm you really want to delete '__filename__' ?

errors.cantRetrieveListOfFiles: Can't retrieve the list of files. [__causedBy__]

importImagesModal.title: Import images
importImagesModal.selectImage: Select an image to use on the EV3:
importImagesModal.selectCodeAndCopy: If you want to use the image, select and copy the following code:

errors.fileIsNotAnImageSelectAnother: '__filename__' cannot be read as an image, select a valid image file

ev3brick.confirmStopScriptAlreadyRunning: A script is already running, stop the script currently running and start the new script ?

demo.no_connection_to_EV3: Demo mode, some of the feature will not be available as Gnikrap is not running on an EV3 brick.
demo.no_stop_nor_shutdown: Demo mode, nothing will be stopped/shutdown

errors.webSocketNotSupported: WebSocket not supported by your Browser. Please try with a recent version of your browser. If not possible, please consider installing Firefox.
errors.ev3ConnectionFailed: EV3 Brick connection failed. Connection will be retried in a few seconds. [__causedBy__]
errors.ev3ConnectionNok: EV3 Brick connection closed by the EV3 brick. Connection will be retried in a few seconds.
errors.cantRunScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't execute the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down
errors.cantStopScriptEV3ConnectionNok: Can't stop the script, the connection with the EV3 brick is down
errors.cantDoSomethingEV3ConnectionNok: '__action__' cannot be done, the connection with the EV3 brick is down

server.@comment: Translation for the stuff coming from the server/brick

errors.MESSAGE_FIELD_NOT_FOUND: Can't found field: '__field__' in parameter message
errors.SCRITP_LANGUAGE_NOT_SUPPORTED: Language: '__language__, isn't supported. Try JavaScript instead.
errors.UNKNOWN_ACTION: No processor registered for action name: '__action__'
errors.INVALID_SENSOR_PORT: Sensor port '__port__' isn't valid should be in [S1, S2, S3, S4] or [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_MOTOR_PORT: Motor port '__port__' isn't valid, should be in [A, B, C, D]
errors.INVALID_CHANNEL_VALUE: Invalid channel value: '__channel__', valid values in [1, 2, 3, 4]
errors.INVALID_NOTE: Invalid note: '__note__', should be in [C1-B7, # allowed on C, D, F, G, A] or [Do-Si, # allowed on Do, Re, Fa, Sol, La]
errors.SCRIPT_STOP_FORCED: Script forced to stop, please use "ev3.isOk()"
errors.CANT_READ_FILE: Can't read file '__filename__', technical error is: __error__
errors.IMAGE_CORRUPTED: The image '__filename__' is corrupted (invalid file size)
errors.BAD_IMAGE_DATA: The data provided to build the image is not correct (try to check that all the lines should have the same length)
errors.CANT_DECODE_IMAGE_INVALID_DATA_SIZE: There is not enough data to decode an image with the following size: [__width__, __height__]
errors.CANT_DECODE_IMAGE: The data provided is not correct for an image, reason: '__reason__'
errors.CANT_DECODE_IMAGE_INVALID_TYPE: The type of the image provided is unknown: __type__

aboutModal.gnikrapShortDescription: Gnikrap is a simple to use but powerfull JavaScript development environment for the Lego Mindstrom EV3.
aboutModal.softwareUsed: This software has been made possible by using several open-source software:
aboutModal.gnikrapLicence: Licence (full text of the GPL v3 licence):

blocks.@comment: Translation for blockly'blocks defined for Gnikrap

errors.blockTwoDifferentSensorsOnTheSamePort: There are two different sensors using the same port.
errors.blockTwoDifferentMotorsOnTheSamePort: There are two different motor types defined for the same port.
errors.blockNeedToDefineMotorType: Motor type is not defined for this port.
errors.blockXSensorValue: All xSensors blocks must be inside a 'with the xSensor ... started do' block.
errors.compilePortWithSeveralMotorType: ERROR: Port __port__ used with several motor types !
errors.compileMotorTypeNotDefineFor: WARNING: Motor type not defined for port __port__. The motor type will be set by default to 'LargeMotor' for this port.
errors.compilePortUsedForSeveralSensor: ERROR: Port __port__ used for several sensors types !
errors.compileXSensorMustBeInsideWithxSensorDo: ERROR: All xSensors blocks must be inside a 'with the xSensor ... started do' block !

gnikrap_ev3_notify.tooltip: Display a message on the Gnikrap interface.

gnikrap_ev3_isok.tooltip: Return true if everything is ok on the EV3 brick, false otherwise.

gnikrap_ev3_wait_until.tooltip: Wait until the condition was true.

gnikrap_ev3_sleep.tooltip: Make the program sleeping for the given time.

gnikrap_ev3_led.tooltip: Change the LED status to the selected lightning pattern.

list_change_LED_status.OFF: change the LED status to off
list_change_LED_status.GREEN: change the LED status to green
list_change_LED_status.GREEN_1: change the LED status to flashing green
list_change_LED_status.GREEN_2: change the LED status to fast flashing green
list_change_LED_status.ORANGE: change the LED status to orange
list_change_LED_status.ORANGE_1: change the LED status to flashing orange
list_change_LED_status.ORANGE_2: change the LED status to fast flashing orange
list_change_LED_status.RED: change the LED status to red
list_change_LED_status.RED_1: change the LED status to flashing red
list_change_LED_status.RED_2: change the LED status to fast flashing red

gnikrap_ev3_sound_playnote.tooltip: Play the given note for the given duration.

gnikrap_ev3_touchsensor_pushed.tooltip: Return true if the touch sensor is pushed, false otherwise.

gnikrap_ev3_colorsensor_reflected.tooltip: Return the reflected light: a value between 0 and 100.

gnikrap_ev3_colorsensor_ambient.tooltip: Return the ambient light: a value between 0 and 100.

gnikrap_ev3_colorsensor_getcolor.tooltip: Return the color (in English) of the sensor.

gnikrap_ev3_colorsensor_iscolor.tooltip: Return true if the color sensor 'view' the selected color, false otherwise.

list_colors_detected.NONE: no color is detected by sensor

gnikrap_ev3_irsensor_setchannel.tooltip: Set the channel to use with the IR sensor.

gnikrap_ev3_irsensor_getdistance.tooltip: Return the distance from the IR sensor: a value between 0 and 100.

gnikrap_ev3_irsensor_getremotecommand.tooltip: Return true if the selected button of the remote beacon is pressed, false otherwise.

list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.TOP_LEFT: top left button is enabled on IR sensor
list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.TOP_RIGHT: top right button is enabled on IR sensor
list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.BOTTOM_LEFT: bottom left button is enabled on IR sensor
list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.BOTTOM_RIGHT: bottom right button is enabled on IR sensor
list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.BEACON: beacon button is enabled on IR sensor
list_beacon_buttons_enabled_on_sensor.NOTHING: nothing is enabled on IR sensor

gnikrap_ev3_keyboard_wait.tooltip: Wait for a button to be pressed (and released is selected).

gnikrap_ev3_keyboard_ispressed.tooltip: Return true if the button pressed, false otherwise.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_settype.tooltip: Set the type of motor on the given port.

list_motor_type_connected_on.LARGE: a large motor is connected on port
list_motor_type_connected_on.MEDIUM: a medium motor is connected on port

gnikrap_ev3_motor_move.tooltip: Start/stop the given motor. The program execution continue immediatly while the motor has taken in account the action.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_ismoving.tooltip: Return true if the motor is moving, false otherwise.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_rotate.tooltip: Rotate the given motor for the given number of turn or degree. With 'start rotate', the program execution continue immediatly while the motor has taken in account the action. With 'rotate' the program wait the end of the move before going further.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_setspeed.tooltip: Set the speed of the motor.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_getspeed.tooltip: Return the speed of the motor.

gnikrap_ev3_motor_gettacho.tooltip: Return the tacho count since the last 'reset tacho'.

gnikrap_ev3_xsensor_workwith.tooltip: If the xSensor exist and is started execute the 'do' statements. Otherwise, the 'else' optional statements will be performed.

gnikrap_ev3_xgyro_getvalue.tooltip: Return the angle value of the xGyro for the selected axis.

gnikrap_ev3_xgeo_getvalue.tooltip: Return the value of the xGeo for the selected measure.

gnikrap_ev3_xvideo_containsobject.tooltip: Return true if the object with the given name currently tracked by the xVideo sensor, false otherwise.

gnikrap_ev3_xvideo_getvalue.tooltip: Return for the given object the value of the selected coordinate.

list_axis_for_object.X: xVideo x value for the object
list_axis_for_object.Y: xVideo y value for the object

gnikrap_ev3_xtouch_istouchpressed.tooltip: Return true if the given touch is pressed, false otherwise.

words: drawArc(x, y, width, height, startAngle, arcAngle)
fillArc(x, y, width, height, startAngle, arcAngle)
